article_title: Private Exchange Beats Health Inflation, Shows Staying Power

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Companies that turned to a new private exchange concept of giving their workers money to buy health benefits via online marketplaces continue to see lower health care costs than trends for most other employers, saving “more than $750 per worker” for 2015, according to benefits consultancy Aon Hewitt (AON). Across companies [...]
